title: Implement Secure Multi-Factor Authentication
description: As a user, I want to log in with multiple verification factors, so that I can have a secure and compliant login process.
attributes_and_rules: The system must require at least two verification factors (password, OTP, biometric). All user credentials and sessions must be fully encrypted. The system must comply with financial data security and privacy regulations. The authentication process should be user-friendly with reduced login friction.
acceptance_criteria: 1. User can log in using password and OTP. 2. User can log in using password and biometric validation. 3. System encrypts user credentials and sessions. 4. System adheres to financial data security and privacy regulations.
test_cases:
Given a user with valid credentials, When they log in using password and OTP, Then they should be successfully authenticated and logged in.
Given a user with valid credentials, When they log in using password and biometric validation, Then they should be successfully authenticated and logged in.

epic_title: Responsive User Interface and Personalized Dashboard
title: Design Responsive Dashboard
description: As a user, I want a responsive dashboard, so that I can have a consistent experience across all my devices.
attributes_and_rules: The dashboard should be compatible with desktops, tablets, and mobile phones. It should display relevant banking products and account details based on user profiles. It must incorporate accessibility standards and offer intuitive navigation.
core_domain_objects: User, Dashboard, Banking Products, Account Details
acceptance_criteria: 1. Dashboard displays correctly on desktops. 2. Dashboard displays correctly on tablets. 3. Dashboard displays correctly on mobile phones. 4. Dashboard displays personalized content based on user profiles. 5. Dashboard adheres to accessibility standards.
test_cases:
Given a user, When they access the dashboard on desktop, Then the dashboard should display correctly and show relevant content.
Given a user, When they access the dashboard on mobile, Then the dashboard should display correctly and show relevant content.

epic_title: Integration with Core Banking and Portal Database
title: Integrate Portal with Core Banking System
description: As a user, I want the self-service portal to be integrated with the bankâ€™s core systems, so that I can perform banking transactions seamlessly.
attributes_and_rules: There must be a secure integration layer to connect the portal with core banking systems. The integration should support bidirectional updates for transactions and service requests. Data synchronization integrity must be maintained.
core_domain_objects: User, Banking Transactions, Service Requests, Core Banking System
acceptance_criteria: 1. Integration layer securely connects portal with core banking systems. 2. Transactions and service requests can be updated bidirectionally. 3. Data synchronization integrity is maintained.
test_cases:
Given a user, When they submit a transaction via the portal, Then the transaction should be reflected in the core banking system.
Given a service request initiated in the core banking system, When the portal is accessed, Then the request details should be visible and updated accordingly.

epic_title: Digital Account Opening and Service Modification Workflows
title: Enable Digital Account Opening
description: As a user, I want to digitally initiate account opening, so that I can create an account with less friction.
attributes_and_rules: The workflow must guide users through low-click steps for account opening. Data validation and prepopulation should be included where possible. Integration with backend systems for automated processing is required. Users should be able to save and resume applications.
core_domain_objects: User, Account Opening Workflow, Backend Systems
acceptance_criteria: 1. User can initiate and complete account opening digitally. 2. Form data is prepopulated where possible. 3. User can save and resume the application.
test_cases:
Given a user, When they initiate account opening, Then they should be guided by low-click steps.
Given a user, When they save an application in progress, Then they should be able to resume it later.

title: Implement Document Upload Capability
description: As a user, I want to upload necessary documents securely, so that they can be used in my application or service modification process.
attributes_and_rules: The system should allow secure document uploads linked to respective workflows. Files should be scanned for malware, validated, and versioned. Encryption methods must be applied.
acceptance_criteria: 1. User can upload documents securely. 2. Documents are scanned for malware. 3. Documents are validated and versioned. 4. Documents are encrypted.
test_cases:
Given a user, When they upload a document, Then it should be securely transmitted and stored.
Given an uploaded document, When it is processed, Then it should be scanned for malware and validated.

title: Implement Real-Time Status Tracking
description: As a user, I want to view the real-time status of my requests, so that I can stay updated on their progress.
attributes_and_rules: The system must provide real-time status updates for all submitted applications and requests. It should push updates instantly and send configurable email and push notifications.
acceptance_criteria: 1. User can view real-time status updates. 2. System pushes updates instantly. 3. Configurable email and push notifications are sent at each workflow stage.
test_cases:
Given a user, When they view their application status, Then it should show real-time updates.
Given an application status change, When the system processes it, Then a relevant notification should be sent to the user.

epic_title: User Interaction History and Audit Logging
title: Maintain User Interaction History
description: As a user, I want to see a history of my interactions, so that I can review my past actions and transactions.
attributes_and_rules: The system should capture and display user actions, transactions, and requests. Advanced search and filtering capabilities should be available. Logging must ensure system auditability and compliance with standards.
acceptance_criteria: 1. User can view a comprehensive history of actions and transactions. 2. System supports advanced search and filtering. 3. Logging meets auditability and compliance standards.
test_cases:
Given a user, When they access interaction history, Then it should show all past actions and transactions.
Given a search query, When it is applied, Then the history should be filtered accordingly.

epic_title: Role-Based Access Control and Permissions Management
title: Implement Role-Based Access Control
description: As an administrator, I want to manage user roles and permissions, so that users can only access authorized services and data.
attributes_and_rules: The system must define and manage user roles and permissions dynamically. Access segregation must be enforced between customers, staff, and administrators. Centralized management for easier maintenance is required.
acceptance_criteria: 1. Administrator can define and manage user roles. 2. Users can only access authorized services and data. 3. System enforces access segregation.
test_cases:
Given an administrator, When they define roles and permissions, Then users should only access authorized data.
Given a user, When they log in, Then their access should be limited to their assigned roles.

epic_title: Data Security and Regulatory Compliance Framework
title: Ensure Data Security and Compliance
description: As a user, I want the system to comply with financial data protection regulations, so that my data is secure.
attributes_and_rules: The security framework must include data encryption at rest and in transit, secure backups, and audit trails. The system must comply with banking sector regulations and include ongoing monitoring and incident management.
acceptance_criteria: 1. Data is encrypted at rest and in transit. 2. Secure backups are maintained. 3. System maintains detailed audit trails. 4. System complies with applicable regulations.
test_cases:
Given system data, When it is stored, Then it should be encrypted at rest.
Given system data, When it is transmitted, Then it should be encrypted in transit.
